reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater attractive and appreciate its quality, with one noting it's a mid-weight piece. The garment is true to size, soft, and not bulky or thick, making it comfortable and warm. They like the amazing colors.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stripey sweater
items.body: How cute is this sweater!! That said, I initially was going to try and change my order from an XL to a L, but I am glad that I didn't. I normally wear a large, they have room and fit well on me, but I ordered this in a size up. I don't think the company is US based, so the sizing might be different. In any case, I'm satisfied with an XL. It looks and fits as a large, so it turned out well. It is an actual sweater which is a big plus, not a sweatshirt with an iron-on pattern. For some reason, this color combo reminds me of Neopolitan ice cream. ðŸ˜Š It is soft after being taken from it's vacuum packaging and was well made. It has a crew, almost boat neck and I will say does not look like the ad. ( that photo shows an almost cashmere looking, longer lengthed sweater.) This one is very soft, but it doesn't look the same. Every bit as pretty, just not like the photo in the ad, so I still would recommend this sweater. It is a pretty sweater, not too hefty, but warm enough for the winter we're having, though I would recommend a tee or blouse of some sort underneath. The price was a pretty decent and a fair amount considering that the product is a nice one. I used to tell my granddaughter " you can't go wrong with a stripey shirt." I think it applies for a sweater, in this case. Definitely recommend. It is a really sweet little sweater.â¤ï¸ Read more
items.author: Vera Hensley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: Beautiful sweater. I purchased the xl. I haven't worn or washed it. But I liked the design and feel of this material. Fits the way I like my sweaters. Read more
items.author: C. Perry

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice lightweight sweater
items.body: Nice lightweight sweater. I normally wear a large but ordered an extra large for the looser fit. I ordered the black/brown striped and when I pulled it out of the package I first thought it looked like a men's sweater. However, once on, it's quite attractive with little holes in the sleeves. It's very soft, and seems to be of good quality. It does seem to attract pet hair. I have a lab that sheds and it didn't take long for her hair to be on it. However a lint remover took them right off. Read more
items.author: CherylMc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Quality mid-weight sweater. Colors are rich and accurate to the picture. I ordered a medium, my usual size, and this sweater fit perfectly. No funny smell like some online purchases. So glad I finally ordered this after looking at it for quite some time. It will definitely be a go-to sweater this winter! Read more
items.author: NP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Love this sweater! So soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Lee A Lamothe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Nice and warm. Definitely oversized Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's exactly what description gives
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. The colors are amazing, the fit is perfect to your size and it's comfortable. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Garvey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick but not bulky
items.body: Sweater is very nice. Fits true to size and color was as advertised. Sweater is thicker but not bulky. I was somewhat disappointed in the feel as it was not as soft as I expected. I have sensitive skin so needed to wear a shirt underneath. I have washed once (I lay flat to dry all sweaters) and it came out looking just as good. More time needed to see if it unravels after multiple washes. Overall, I really like it and would recommend. Read more
items.author: CJP

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Taupe, Off-white, Blue, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
